title: Bug 14047 StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the StyledText document in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines to the document.
3. Observe that each line appended triggers a redraw of the entire client area.

To verify the issue:
1. Add the following line to the performPaint method in StyledText:
   System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
2. Compile and run the application.
3. Repeat steps 1-3 of the reproduction steps.
4. Observe the console output for the line count, paint Y position, and render height values during each redraw.
